entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 1:36 PM MDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 1:36 PM MDT Friday 28 April 2023
